sentences.sContent: Rory tried to sneak a surreptitious glance at Adam’s wristwatch.
sentences.sCn: 罗里试图偷偷看一眼亚当的手表。

synos.tran: 秘密的；鬼鬼祟祟的；暗中的

remMethod.val: sur(在…下) + rep (=rap 拿， 抓住) + titious → 偷偷拿 → 鬼鬼祟祟的

words.tran: 偷偷地；秘密地；不正当地

trans.tranOther: done secretly or quickly because you do not want other people to notice
